message.content:
The relevant line item for cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets is usually labeled as "Purchase of Fixed Assets" or similar under Cash Flow from Investing Activities.

From the provided problem data:  
| Account                    | Amount     | Date       |  
|----------------------------|------------|------------|  
| Purchase of Fixed Assets    | 2729032.26 | 2024-02-05 |

This represents the cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets.

Hence, the extracted value is 2729032.26.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "2729032.26"} }
```
